nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部
en: Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的军事工作部门，是中华人民共和国的国家军事行政机关。
description.en: The military affairs department under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, serving as the state's military administrative body.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任国防部部长。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, former Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任国防部部长，被定为毛泽东的接班人后在九一三事件中身亡。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China and former Minister of National Defense, who died in the September 13 Incident after being designated as Mao Zedong's successor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任国防部部长。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, former Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任国防部部长。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, former Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国防部部长，是唯一一位没有军衔的国防部长。
description.en: Former Minister of National Defense, and the only one to have held the post without a military rank.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，曾任中央军委主席。
description.en: The paramount leader of the second generation of leadership of the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任国防部部长。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, former Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任国防部部长。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, former Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第三代中央领导集体的核心人物，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: The paramount leader of the third generation of leadership of the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任国防部部长。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, former Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任国防部部长。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, former Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任国防部部长，于2024年11月12日去世，享年83岁。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army and former Minister of National Defense, who passed away on November 12, 2024, at the age of 83.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任国防部部长。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, former Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军上将，曾任国防部部长，后因涉嫌严重违纪违法被审查。
description.en: General of the PLA Rocket Force and former Minister of National Defense, later investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任国防部部长，后被免职并开除党籍军籍。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army and former Minister of National Defense, later removed from office and expelled from the party and military.

description.zh-cn: 现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Current Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，现任国防部部长。
description.en: Admiral of the PLA Navy, current Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest national military leading body of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央政府（国务院）的首长。
description.en: The head of the central government (State Council) of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1954年至1955年间发生于台湾海峡的军事冲突。
description.en: A military conflict that occurred in the Taiwan Strait between 1954 and 1955.

description.zh-cn: 1958年发生于金门及其周边地区的炮击战役。
description.en: An artillery battle that took place in and around Kinmen in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 1959年中共中央在庐山召开的会议，会上彭德怀等人受到错误批判。
description.en: A meeting held by the CPC Central Committee in Lushan in 1959, during which Peng Dehuai and others were wrongly criticized.

description.zh-cn: 庐山会议后对彭德怀、黄克诚、张闻天、周小舟等人的政治定性和迫害。
description.en: The political labeling and persecution of Peng Dehuai, Huang Kecheng, Zhang Wentian, Zhou Xiaozhou, and others after the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 指1971年9月13日林彪等人乘机出走并坠毁于蒙古温都尔汗的事件。
description.en: Refers to the incident on September 13, 1971, when Lin Biao and others fled by plane and crashed in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 1962年中国和印度之间因边界问题爆发的战争。
description.en: A war between China and India in 1962 over border disputes.

description.zh-cn: 1969年中国和苏联在珍宝岛（达曼斯基岛）发生的武装冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict between China and the Soviet Union on Zhenbao (Damansky) Island in 1969.

nodes.id: 林副主席指示第一号令

zh-cn: 林副主席指示第一号令

description.zh-cn: 1969年由林彪发布的关于加强战备、防止苏联突然袭击的指示。
description.en: An order issued by Lin Biao in 1969 on strengthening war preparedness to prevent a surprise attack by the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1976年华国锋、叶剑英等人采取行动，逮捕“四人帮”成员的事件。
description.en: The event in 1976 where Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, and others took action to arrest the members of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 1979年中国和越南之间爆发的边境战争。
description.en: A border war that broke out between China and Vietnam in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 1985年邓小平宣布的中国人民解放军裁减员额一百万的重大决策。
description.en: A major decision announced by Deng Xiaoping in 1985 to reduce the number of PLA personnel by one million.

description.zh-cn: 1988年中国与越南在南沙群岛赤瓜礁附近发生的海上冲突。
description.en: A naval conflict between China and Vietnam near Johnson South Reef in the Spratly Islands in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的政治事件，以军队清场告终。
description.en: A political event that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, in 1989, ending with a military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 1995年至1996年间，因台湾问题引发的一系列军事演习和紧张局势。
description.en: A series of military exercises and heightened tensions triggered by issues related to Taiwan between 1995 and 1996.

description.zh-cn: 2001年美国海军侦察机与中国海军航空兵战斗机在南中国海相撞的事件。
description.en: The 2001 incident involving a collision between a U.S. Navy surveillance aircraft and a PLA Naval Air Force fighter jet over the South China Sea.

description.zh-cn: 指胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记和温家宝担任国务院总理期间的中国政治时期。
description.en: Refers to the period of Chinese politics when Hu Jintao served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and Wen Jiabao served as Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 2015年起由习近平领导推行的对中国人民解放军的大规模改革。
description.en: A large-scale reform of the People's Liberation Army led by Xi Jinping starting in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防部副部长

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部副部长
en: Vice Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部的副职领导人，该职位自1983年起不再设立。
description.en: The deputy head of the Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China, a position that has not been filled since 1983.

en: Constituent Departments of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 构成中华人民共和国国务院的各部、各委员会、中国人民银行、审计署等。
description.en: The ministries, commissions, the People's Bank of China, the National Audit Office, etc., that constitute the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhou Enlai's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Mao Zedong was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 庐山会议后被撤销国防部长职务。
description.en: Was dismissed from the post of Minister of National Defense after the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 被划为“彭德怀反党集团”的首要分子。
description.en: Was labeled as the chief member of the 'Peng Dehuai Anti-Party Clique'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhou Enlai's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Mao Zedong was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中身亡，国防部长任期终止。
description.en: Lin Biao died in the September 13 Incident, ending his term as Minister of National Defense.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhou Enlai's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Hua Guofeng's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Mao Zedong was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Hua Guofeng was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 作为国防部长，在怀仁堂政变中发挥了关键作用。
description.en: As Minister of National Defense, played a key role in the Huirentang Coup.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Hua Guofeng's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在赵紫阳担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhao Ziyang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Hua Guofeng was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 任内奉命下令停止炮击金门。
description.en: During his tenure, he was ordered to cease the shelling of Kinmen.

description.zh-cn: 担任国防部长期间，中越战争爆发。
description.en: The Sino-Vietnamese War broke out during his tenure as Minister of National Defense.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在赵紫阳担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhao Ziyang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Deng Xiaoping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 习近平曾担任耿飚的秘书。
description.en: Xi Jinping once served as Geng Biao's secretary.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在赵紫阳担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhao Ziyang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Deng Xiaoping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在李鹏担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Li Peng's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Deng Xiaoping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Jiang Zemin was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件期间担任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在李鹏担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Li Peng's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在朱镕基担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Zhu Rongji's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Jiang Zemin was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Wen Jiabao's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Jiang Zemin was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Hu Jintao was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Wen Jiabao's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Hu Jintao was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在李克强担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Li Keqiang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Xi Jinping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 担任国防部长期间，深化国防和军队改革开始。
description.en: During his tenure as Minister of National Defense, the deepening of national defense and military reform began.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在李克强担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Li Keqiang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Xi Jinping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌严重违纪违法被中央军委纪检部门立案审查。
description.en: Placed under investigation by the disciplinary inspection department of the Central Military Commission for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 被开除党籍。
description.en: Expelled from the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在李强担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense during Li Qiang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Served as Minister of National Defense while Xi Jinping was Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会通过免去李尚福的国务委员、国防部长职务。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the National People's Congress approved the removal of Li Shangfu from his posts as State Councilor and Minister of National Defense.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 在李强担任总理期间任国防部长。
description.en: Serves as Minister of National Defense during Li Qiang's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任军委主席期间任国防部长。
description.en: Serves as Minister of National Defense while Xi Jinping is Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 国防部是国务院的组成部门之一。
description.en: The Ministry of National Defense is one of the constituent departments of the State Council.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国防部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部副部长

description.zh-cn: 自1983年以来，中华人民共和国国防部不再设立国防部副部长职位。
description.en: Since 1983, the Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China has no longer established the position of Vice Minister of National Defense.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 国防部部长由国务院总理提名。
description.en: The Minister of National Defense is nominated by the Premier of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 国防部部长人选由全国人民代表大会投票表决通过。
description.en: The candidate for Minister of National Defense is approved by a vote of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 国家主席根据全国人民代表大会的决定任命国防部部长。
description.en: The President appoints the Minister of National Defense based on the decision of the National People's Congress.
